tool_description:
Integrate receiving SMS message into your apps and applications, enabling automation based on incoming text messages.

For a simple demonstration, see https://www.tomwimmenhove.com/sms/
title: SMS Receive

api_list.name: /GetNumbers
api_list.description: Get a list of available numbers to receive messages from.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sms-receive.p.rapidapi.com/GetNumbers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms-receive.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /SetTag

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: The value of the new tag with a maximum of 16 characters.

api_list.name: /GetUpdates
api_list.description: Get updates about newly received messages.

required_parameters.name: start_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the last received message plus one. Set to zero for the first call.

optional_parameters.name: time_out
optional_parameters.description: A time-out (in seconds) indicating how long the server should wait for an imcomming message before returning.
